Name: PHGDH deficiency
Definition: A serine deficiency that has_material_basis_in deficiency of phosphoglycerate dehydrogenase which results in a disruption of L-serine biosynthesis.

Name: PSAT deficiency
Definition: A serine deficiency that has_material_basis_in deficiency of phosphoserine aminotransferase and is characterized by low concentartions of serine and flycine in plasma and cerebrospinal fluid.

Name: PSPH deficiency
Definition: A serine deficiency that has_material_basis_in deficiency of phosphoserine phosphatase impeding the synthesis of L-serine.

Name: Neu-Laxova syndrome 2
Definition: A serine deficiency that is characterized by multiple fatal malformations including ichthyosis

Name: Neu-Laxova syndrome 1
Definition: A serine deficiency that is characterized by multiple fatal malformations including ichthyosis
